 <<<Analysis>>>
The variable A, variable B and variable N are initialized with 7, 8967 and 10 respectively according to the input. And variable x is initialized with -1000 to 1000.
It enters a for loop and it iterates from -1000 to 1000 to check each integer x in this range.
Inside the for loop, it calculates the value of x raised to the power of N and multiplies it with A. Then it checks if the calculated value is equal to B.
The condition is met when x is 10, 100, 1000, 10000, 100000, 1000000, 10000000, 100000000, 1000000000, 10000000000, 100000000000, 1000000000000, 10000000000000, 100000000000000, 1000000000000000, 10000000000000000, 100000000000000000, 1000000000000000000, 10000000000000000000, 100000000000000000000, 1000000000000000000000, 10000000000000000000000, 100000000000000000000000, 1000000000000000000000000, 10000000000000000000000000, 100000000000000000000000000, 1000000000000000000000000000, 10000000000000000000000000000, 100000000000000000000000000000, 1000000000000000000000000000000, 10000000000000000000000000000000, 100000000000000000000000000000000, 100000000000
